Email Services

Here are some secure services that put your privacy first. No email reading here.

  • ProtonMail - Founded by former CERN scientists, the place where the Net was born. Review and Setup Guide
  • Tutanota
  • Posteo - Paid, in euros, so maybe not available to everyone everywhere
  • Clean Email - Great service for email filtering
  • Fastmail - Paid, no ads
  • Hushmail - Secure solution for corporations
  • Mail Fence - Been around since 1999! They take privacy for real reals
  • Runbox
  • POP, IMAP explained and more here
  • Extensive List of New Email Projects

Proton Mail

Free & Paid

Desktop & Mobile

Proton Mail is built by scientists and engineers who met at CERN. A user friendly interface backed by end-to-end encryption with an anonymous sign up process makes this the go to email for security and privacy.

It's based in Switzerland which maintains strict privacy laws. User data is impossible to access, so don't lose your password.

  • Desktop and Mobile
  • Open Source Encryption
  • Zero Access to User Data

Setup Guide
Proton Mail Founder Ted Talk
